alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:43AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR EASTERN PHELPS...KEARNEY AND SOUTHEASTERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kearney to 7 miles southeast of Odessa to Funk, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Minden around 500 AM CDT. Heartwell and Norman around 515 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 263 and 292. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
